content.description: Clara has test anxiety. Her teacher taps his pen while students are taking a test. After several test days, Clara experiences anxiety when she hears this tapping, even on days when there is no test.
content.question: Which of the following statements is true about this scenario?

choices.label: Her fear of the test is the conditioned response (CR).
The tapping of the pen is the unconditioned stimulus (UCS).
Her fear when she hears the tapping when there is no test is the conditioned response (CR).
A test in this class is the conditioned stimulus (CS).

content.answer: Her fear when she hears the tapping when there is no test is the conditioned response (CR).

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
